content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Maryam Abbasi from Iran.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of our conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for the apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why didn't you agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: The negotiation did not result in an agreed upon price because we could not find a middle ground that met both of our expectations. I was willing to go down to 825 Euros per month, but Maryam was looking for a price closer to 800 Euros. I did not want to continue the negotiation below this price as it did not meet my expectation.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner at 8, as the conversation was respectful and productive.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation. The conversation was respectful and focused on the topic of negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt
